Address.label: Address
Address.value: 152, TEHERAN-RO,13TH FLOOR, GANGNAM FINANCE CENTER, SEOUL, 6236, South Korea

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: DoubleDown Interactive Co Ltd is engaged in the business of developing and publishing games on mobile and web-based platforms. The company focuses on the casino gaming segment. Its flagship game is DoubleDown Casino. Other games developed by the company are DoubleDown Fort, DoubleDown Classic, and Ellen's Road to Riches. The company has its presence in the global market.
